name: Bloomies
description:
*The Married Gamers* - "I wish yard work was this fun... for just .99 cents, and let me say this first, it’s worth every one of those 99 pennies."

*Gamers With Casts* - "At only $1, I highly recommend buying Bloomies.. You may be as pleasantly surprised as I was."

*Tech Gaming Podcast* - Let's use the whole thing if it fits! "I never
thought I'd enjoy growing flowers so much! These are some of the nicest,
most charming, beautifully drawn graphics I've seen on iPhone. I've
developed a Tamagotchi-like connection to my garden, and am playing it more
than any other iPhone game."

*Touch My Apps* - "Inexpensive, Looks Great, Sounds Great. Grab It"

Need some time to relax? Come and join the most colorful world of flowers and bees you´ve ever seen!

Come and explore our fun and vibrant world of Bloomies. Cultivate fantastic and colorful baby plants and help them grow so they will attract beautiful butterflies and hardworking bees. Keep your bees busy and they will collect the precious nectar needed to decorate your bloomy world and help you build your gorgeous garden palace!

Top Features:
- Real-time game with 16 cute Bloomies, 18 Bees, 8 Butterflies
- Garden Palace with many features to unlock
- 24 items to decorate your garden
- Achievements

Follow Bloomies on Facebook!
